mapper.insert: insert into db_edisaddress (ADDRESSID, CITY, COMPANY, CONTACT, COUNTRYCODE, DISTRICT, MOBILE, 'NAME', POSTCODE, PROVINCE, STREET1, STREET2, STREET3, 'TYPE') values (#{addressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countrycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update db_edisaddress set CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRYCODE = #{countrycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STREET1 = #{street1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STREET2 = #{street2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STREET3 = #{street3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'TYPE' = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ADDRESSID = #{addressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ADDRESSID, CITY, COMPANY, CONTACT, COUNTRYCODE, DISTRICT, MOBILE, 'NAME', POSTCODE, PROVINCE, STREET1, STREET2, STREET3, 'TYPE' from db_edisaddress where ADDRESSID = #{addressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ADDRESSID, CITY, COMPANY, CONTACT, COUNTRYCODE, DISTRICT, MOBILE, 'NAME', POSTCODE, PROVINCE, STREET1, STREET2, STREET3, 'TYPE' from db_edisaddress
